subject: Quick follow-up — next step?
body:
Taylor,

Just circling back — it’s been about 7 day(s) since we last spoke. Picking up the thread on the pricing options we discussed.

If it helps, I can propose the next step and line up the pieces. Does this week still work to move this forward?

Best,
Neville

meta.call_to_action: Does this week still work to move this forward?
